name: Official USA Token
description: The Official USA Token ($USA) is a decentralized digital asset designed for long-term sustainability, transparency, and cross-chain functionality. Built on Solana, the project operates with a deflationary model, having burned 80% of its total supply to ensure scarcity and enhance value. $USA is committed to compliance and responsible development, engaging with a U.S.-based legal advisor and requesting a meeting with the SECâ€™s Crypto Task Force. Its roadmap includes strategic exchange listings, staking mechanisms, AI-powered trading automation, and cross-chain expansion to provide users with liquidity, passive earning opportunities, and a scalable ecosystem.
